mods.abstract: In the interview, Arndt discusses her decision to enter social work; her education and career before coming to LSU; the impact of World War II on the development of day care for children; and the LSU School of Social Work, including Dr. Earl E. Klein and other faculty members, students, curriculum, students' field experiences, enrollment, and specialties offered.; Arndt describes her professional activities and honors received and compares schools of social work at Tulane and LSU.
